title: Nightfall till Daybreak
description: One day a stranger steals a kiss from her on a deserted shore--the next time they meet, she is a slave and he her captor. Enslaved by one king, and then by his successor, Freya fights to regain her freedom in a world controlled by ruthless men.  Resourceful and determined, Freya has just one weakness: Aidan of Connacht, the new king's right-hand. Aidan, an incorrigible flirt, has accompanied his lord to Britannia, in search of a new life. However, he soon realizes his loyalty will cost him dearly.In the shadow of approaching war, Freya and Aidan gradually grow closer--but neither can give in to their desire. It now appears both their fates are now tied to that of the doomed king's. If they want their freedom and a chance at love, they are going to have to fight for it.The enthralling second novel of THE KINGDOM OF THE EAST ANGLES series, for fans of Historical Fiction, Historical Romance and Adventure. Readers who love Diana Gabaldon, Bernard Cornwell and Elizabeth Chadwick should enjoy this epic romance adventure set in Dark Ages Britain. Although each novel follows on historically, this series can be read as separate, standalone, romances. NIGHTFALL TILL DAYBREAK was a Quarter-finalist in the Amazon Breakthrough Novel Award, 2014--Romance category.
author: Jayne Castel
